name: Carpets
description: The most important and famous artistic achievement of Gross is the carpet, a knot of weaves that has a worthy share in the culture of Iranian carpet weaving and with the name of iron carpet, it is associated with enduring handicrafts and hardworking people in the field of life.Carpet is a tool for displaying many arts; Including drawing and painting, painting, dots, spinning, dyeing and most importantly, skillful weaving, which combines art and feeling with the cooperation of its members and organs, ie from the heart and eyes to the hands and fingers, such small knots and Delicate and beautiful and at the same time strong, it embosses on the fabric of the carpet, which shows both elegance and beauty, and its strength and durability have gained worldwide fame.
